A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Solid movie after seeing it a second time.  My initial impression was one of disappointment.  However\, after seeing it again\, I'm more inclined to understand what RJ had intended.  Obviously there are some plot holes\, but overall I found it to be quite entertaining.  I actually enjoyed the methodical approach in trying to lure Luke into the conflict.  Overall\, I give it a solid B.
